summary:
Add a very challenging battle against 30 unique enemies
that will give dragon soul when killed
NPCs and Vanilla Assets only
descriptionHtml:
Add a very challenging battle against 30 unique enemies
that will give dragon soul when killed
NPCs and Vanilla Assets only

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

Story wtf:
There were stories long ago of a group of ancient nord mages and later become a cult that have found ways to imitate the power of dragonborns.
They hunt for the dragons then eat their flesh harnessing the souls of the dragon and binding it to their bodies,
giving them the same strength, speed and the power to control the voice of the dragonborns.
The dragons have return to skyrim and so as they. You are the last dragonborn eliminate these copycats.

[color=#00ff00]There are two version:[/color]
1. Respawnable
2. No Respawn

[b][size=3][b][size=3]If you defeat them they will respawn within 10[/size][/b][b][size=3] days [/size][/b]
just dont visit the place within [b][size=3][b][size=3]10 [/size][/b][b][size=3]days [/size][/b][/size][/b].[/size][/b]

I create this mod because I really like hard enemies, challenges and getting my dragonborn's *ss get kicked.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location:

[color=#00ff00]Hideout:[/color]
Bannermist Tower
Cradle Stone Tower
Peak's Shade Tower
Sundered Towers
Valtheim Towers

[color=#00ff00]Dragon Hunting Party:[/color]
Dragontooth Crater
Ancient's Ascent
Autumnwatch Tower
Northwind Summit
Lost Tongue Overlook
Bonestrewn Crest
Shearpoint
Eldersblood Peak
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
